title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
doppelganger as well? What's the story behind the Selune's Tears reference?

Select the first option, and Geraldus appreciates simply being alive. He then inquires if you are the individual sent by High Harper Jaheira. You can reply with:

Indeed, I am. I've come to offer assistance. Jaheira didn't dispatch me anywhere. We're partners, equals. I'm not associated with the Harpers. I happened to be passing by.

Opt for the first option, and he expresses gratitude for being the first friendly face
